name: DESeq2
description: Differential expression analysis for RNA-seq data.

properties.name: alpha
properties.description: Adjusted _p value_ cutoff for independent filtering

properties.name: LFC_shrinkage
properties.description: A logical variable indicating whether the returned log fold-change values should be shrinked.

properties.name: shrinkage_type
properties.description: Type of shrinkage estimator to use.

properties.name: size_factor_type
properties.description: Method used to estimate size factors. See operator README for details.
